description: The Post was nominated in the Outstanding Breaking News Coverage and Outstanding New Approaches: Current News categories.
title: The Washington Post receives two national Emmy award nominations
title_page: The Washington Post receives two national Emmy award nominations - The Washington Post
text:
The Washington Post has received two nominations for the 39th Annual News and Documentary Emmy Awards. The Post’s nominations include the following categories:
Outstanding Breaking News Coverage for Coverage of the 2017 Hurricane Season
Outstanding New Approaches: Current News for Sin Luz: Life Without Power
Additionally, The Washington Post’s reporting in collaboration with 60 Minutes was also nominated in two categories, including:
Outstanding Investigative Report in a Newsmagazine for The Whistleblower
Best Story in a Newsmagazine for The Whistleblower and Too Big to Prosecute
The winners will be revealed at a ceremony in New York on October 1. The full list of nominees can be found here.
